name: app
description: CloudBlitz Student App - A minimal mono-repo with React frontend and Spring Boot microservices

scripts.backend:build: cd backend/auth-service && ./mvnw clean package && cd ../course-service && ./mvnw clean package && cd ../enrollment-service && ./mvnw clean package
scripts.test: cd frontend && npm test && cd ../backend/auth-service && ./mvnw test && cd ../course-service && ./mvnw test && cd ../enrollment-service && ./mvnw test
scripts.health: curl -s http://localhost:8081/api/auth/health && curl -s http://localhost:8082/api/courses/health && curl -s http://localhost:8083/api/enroll/health

author: CloudBlitz Team
